short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy mailto email address instead of opening it in an email client.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert mailto links on any website into clickable items that copy the email address to clipboard instead of opening an email client.

Get rid of the annoying behaviour of opening an email client when mailto links are clicked.
